title: HNP Esports LF Dia Support OOL team Comment below or add Silkenfawn :)
body: Info will be explained when contacting Silkenfawn or commenting below :)

replies.body:
People still looking for only 2% of the player base to be CONSIDERED for a team.

Logic is going to hit you like a cannonball to the face.
Or he can let anyone join and get rolled by team with higher ranked players because their players are better. You know this all too well yourself!

I never said anything about letting anyone join, simply trialing them to see IF they are good enough. Literally in capital letters....

I feel like you guys are all holding each others dicks, not wanting to let anyone join your circle of kool kidz klub.
ive blocked you on everything do not comment :)
